summary: Upgraded webSearch to use DuckDuckGo's API properly with structured results, added safeSearch and region options, improved error handling with response text, added timeout, and returned typed SearchResult array instead of string. Reduced max limit to 50 for API reliability.
next_steps: Add retry logic with exponential backoff for transient failures
Implement rate limiting to respect API quotas
Add support for Bing or Google Custom Search as fallback providers
